parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template. The name can be 1 to 200 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). The name cannot start with ALIYUN, ACS, ALIBABA, or ALICLOUD.

parameters.name: TemplateVersion
parameters.description: The version of the template. The default value is the latest version of the template.
